--- title: "Advent of Code - Day 10: Cathode-Ray Tube" subtitle: "10h day of the advent of code using R" date: 2022-12-10 categories: "advent of code" format: html: df-print: paged editor: markdown: wrap: 80 editor_options: chunk_output_type: inline --- ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} library(tidyr) library(dplyr) library(readr) library(stringr) ``` ::: # Part 1 ## Input ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} sample <-"input.txt" ``` ::: ## Code ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} input <- read_delim(file = sample, delim = " ",col_names = c("name","value")) %>% replace_na(replace = list(value = 0)) result <- input %>% mutate(cycle = cumsum(case_when(name == "addx" ~2, TRUE ~ 1)), register = 1 + lag(cumsum(value),1)) %>% complete(cycle = 1:240) %>% fill(register,.direction = "up") %>% mutate(signal = cycle * register) ``` ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} result %>% filter(cycle %in% seq(20, 220, by=40)) %>% summarise(sum(signal)) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} `````{=html}
````` ::: ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} result %>% mutate(row = (cycle -1) %/% 40, col = (cycle -1) %% 40, pixel = ifelse(col >= register -1 & col <= register +1,"#",".")) %>% group_by(row) %>% summarise(paste0(pixel, collapse="")) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} `````{=html}
